name: Dark Star (Mastertronic)
overview: You are a skyeagle of the jupiton fleet on a suicide mission to destroy the Dark Star one and for all. The Dark Star, a space ship the size of a planet, spread terror and death throughout the galaxies. Its only weak spot is the central thermo nuclear core. You must reach this and with accurate aim explode it with your neutron booster rockets. Many skyeagles have tried and died in the attemps. You plan is to fly low to avoid the Dark Star's deadly energy shield; this means your reactions have to be ultra quick to dodge the numerous projections in your flight path. The enemy's protector ships have been alerted -they are going to blast you. Will you go on record as another skyeagle that tried but failed to destroy the Dark Star? FEATURES: Smooth moving high res multi colour graphic 100% machine code for super-fast action. Sensational synthetised sound effects and catchy tunes. Multi-levels.
